message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $150 for it.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $165. I think this is a fair price that meets your needs and still reflects the value of the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $150 for the product.
